name: Command and Defend
description:
A unique and fun Real Time Strategy (RTS) + Tower Defense (TD) mode Mix

Command and Conquerors is a unique, first of its class mix between a Real Time Strategy (RTS) and a Tower Defense (TD).

Enjoy the unique gameplay mechanics, while you attempt to deffend your command center against the Liberation Army and their terrorist attacks.

Taking inspiration from old Command and Conquer series and similar RTS titles, I have built my own mobile adaptation a game with very similar mechanics, and interesting twists.

Command and Defend is a very ambitious indie Project, carried away by a solo developer ( that crazy person would be me ) and is under constant growth, and is made by a gamer and for gamers, I hope you love it as much as I do!
